### Introduction

The text in an R Markdown document is written with the Markdown syntax. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. By studying this blog, you’ll learn a lot about basic Markdown syntax and LaTeX mathematical typesetting language, and you’ll be able to produce nice-looking documents with R.
